sqlMap.statement: SELECT MSGITEMDSTICNAME AS "MSGITEMDSTICNAME", MSGCLMNNAME AS "MSGCLMNNAME", MSGCLMNATTRIPTRNCD AS "MSGCLMNATTRIPTRNCD", MSGCLMNVAL AS "MSGCLMNVAL", THISMSGCLMNUSEYN AS "THISMSGCLMNUSEYN", THISMSGCLMNREGSNTID AS "THISMSGCLMNREGSNTID", THISMSGCLMNREGIHMS AS "THISMSGCLMNREGIHMS", THISMSGCLMNAMNDRID AS "THISMSGCLMNAMNDRID", THISMSGCLMNAMNDHMS AS "THISMSGCLMNAMNDHMS" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIBM01 WHERE MsgItemDsticName = #MsgItemDsticName#
